long_description: The Princeton Tec Quad Headlamp brings simplicity and versatility to your adventures. It's a great choice for nighttime trail running and general use around camp. 4 LEDs operate in high, medium, low and flashing modes; suitable for use around a campsite or for signalling from a distance. LEDs output 78 lumens on high and throw a beam up to 50m; illuminate objects up to 30m away on medium and 19m away on low. Single strap fits easily over hats and lets you read in comfort in your sleeping bag without a battery pack pressing against the back of your head. Single switch atop the headlamp is easily located and operated; pivoting headlamp lets you point the beam where you prefer. 3 AAA alkaline batteries (included) provide 31 hrs. of regulated light on low, 10 hrs. on medium and 1 hr. on high. Regulated output maintains consistent light output over the lifetime of the batteries. Features a low-battery indicator. Rugged construction withstands inclement weather and drops onto concrete; headlamp is waterproof to 1m. Princeton Tec Quad can operate on lithium AAA batteries (sold separately) for great cold-weather performance and a reduction in weight.
short_description: The Princeton Tec Quad Headlamp brings simplicity and versatility to your adventures. It's a great choice for nighttime trail running and general use around camp.
